forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the sky opens up to a wide canvas of serene blue, painted gently by the sun's early rays. This morning feels pleasantly mild, with temperatures lingering comfortably in the low sixties, a fitting welcome for the day ahead. Afternoon glimpses of the skyline promise the warmth of 65, though a whisper of chill may brush softly against your skin as the sun begins to dip toward the horizon. The gentle north-northwest wind stirs, carrying with it the crispness of the bay, inviting moments spent wandering.

Tonight, the sky will transition into a richly textured tapestry of clouds, gently surrounding a low that settles around 51 degrees. This inviting, cool air beckons you to layer lightly; a cardigan or a light jacket will suffice as the evening unfolds into a quiet, starlit interlude. Without the weight of fog obscuring the iconic landmarks, it’s a perfect day to grab a coffee from your favorite café and find a spot along the waterfront, or perhaps take a leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park, absorbing the rich scents of springtime blooms before nightfall blankets the city.
